channel.title: Rhino Scripting
channel.description:
Hello, my question is about the Rhino Scripting Engine.
Is it possible to import a custom package?
For example my class I want to import is com.daniel.util.Conversion If i use the import in the js file I get this [code] javax.script.ScriptException: sun.org.mozilla.javascript.internal.EvaluatorExcep tion: syntax error (<Unknown source>#1) in <Unknown source> at line number 1 at com.sun.script.javascript.RhinoScriptEngine.eval(Unknown Source) at javax.script.AbstractScriptEngine.eval(Unknown Source) at com.daniel.util.ScriptManager.getFunction(ScriptManager.java:56) [/code]
I had searched google and the Rhino documentation and i can't find anything resulting in custom packages. Please help if you can.

item.title: Rhino Scripting
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

Oh thank you very much.
Default java class is import… thats what i was using

Read full topic

item.title: Rhino Scripting
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

pretty sure its the same as any other package… someting like
importPackage(Packages.my.package.etc)

then you have to use full paths for classes as well

Read full topic

item.title: Rhino Scripting
item.dc:creator: @surfer25 surfer25
item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

Hello,
my question is about the Rhino Scripting Engine.

Is it possible to import a custom package?

For example my class I want to import is
com.daniel.util.Conversion
If i use the import in the js file I get this

javax.script.ScriptException: sun.org.mozilla.javascript.internal.EvaluatorExcep
tion: syntax error (<Unknown source>#1) in <Unknown source> at line number 1
        at com.sun.script.javascript.RhinoScriptEngine.eval(Unknown Source)
        at javax.script.AbstractScriptEngine.eval(Unknown Source)
        at com.daniel.util.ScriptManager.getFunction(ScriptManager.java:56)

I had searched google and the Rhino documentation and i can’t find anything resulting in custom packages.
Please help if you can.
